title: Access Currently Stored Preferences
description: Retrieve and display the user's currently stored preferences from goose memory
example_prompt: What do you know about me so far?
example_result: I know that your name is Ade. You enjoy reading tech blogs, playing with technical tools, and are interested in building agentic systems. You prefer concise and clear communication, and you value efficiency in your workflows. Additionally, you have a keen interest in AI and its applications in various domains.
